actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of former employee of the Senate in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Laon Securities Litigation.

summary.text: Authorizes Kenneth A. McLean, a former Senate employee, to testify in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Loan Securities Litigation, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent such former employee in connection with his testimony in such case.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of former employee of the Senate in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Laon Securities Litigation.
